human.name: Human
human.description: Versatile and adaptable, humans are the most common race in most worlds.

elf.name: Elf
elf.description: Graceful and long-lived, elves are known for their magic and archery.

high_elf.name: High Elf
high_elf.description: Elves with a keen mind and mastery of arcane magic.

wood_elf.name: Wood Elf
wood_elf.description: Swift elves who blend seamlessly with the forest.

dwarf.name: Dwarf
dwarf.description: Stout and hardy, dwarves are known for their craftsmanship and resilience.

hill_dwarf.name: Hill Dwarf
hill_dwarf.description: Dwarves known for their keen senses and remarkable toughness.

mountain_dwarf.name: Mountain Dwarf
mountain_dwarf.description: Strong dwarves skilled in armor and warfare.

halfling.name: Halfling
halfling.description: Small but brave, halflings are known for their luck and good nature.

lightfoot_halfling.name: Lightfoot Halfling
lightfoot_halfling.description: Stealthy halflings who can easily hide from notice.

dragonborn.name: Dragonborn
dragonborn.description: Proud dragon-blooded warriors with scales and breath weapons.

tiefling.name: Tiefling
tiefling.description: Descendants of fiends, tieflings bear the mark of their infernal heritage.

half_orc.name: Half-Orc
half_orc.description: Strong and fierce, half-orcs combine human versatility with orcish power.

gnome.name: Gnome
gnome.description: Small and inventive, gnomes are known for their curiosity and magic.

half_elf.name: Half-Elf
half_elf.description: Combining human adaptability with elven grace and charm.

darkvision.name: Darkvision
darkvision.description: Can see in dim light within 60 feet as if it were bright light.

fey_ancestry.name: Fey Ancestry
fey_ancestry.description: Advantage on saves against being charmed; magic can't put you to sleep.

trance.name: Trance
trance.description: Don't need to sleep; 4 hours of meditation equals 8 hours of sleep.

lucky.name: Lucky
lucky.description: When you roll a 1 on an attack, ability check, or save, reroll and use the new result.

brave.name: Brave
brave.description: Advantage on saves against being frightened.

dwarven_resilience.name: Dwarven Resilience
dwarven_resilience.description: Advantage on saves against poison; resistance to poison damage.

dwarven_toughness.name: Dwarven Toughness
dwarven_toughness.description: HP maximum increases by 1 for each level.

breath_weapon.name: Breath Weapon
breath_weapon.description: Exhale destructive energy based on draconic ancestry.

relentless_endurance.name: Relentless Endurance
relentless_endurance.description: When reduced to 0 HP, drop to 1 HP instead (once per long rest).

savage_attacks.name: Savage Attacks
savage_attacks.description: On a critical hit, roll one additional damage die.

gnome_cunning.name: Gnome Cunning
gnome_cunning.description: Advantage on INT, WIS, CHA saves against magic.
